description:
As their train approaches Enies Lobby, Franky`s kind words cut through Robin`s cold exterior. Luffy`s train is thrown off course, but the group gains a powerful new ally!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shihou no Shima! Enies Lobby no Zenbou!
The Judicial Island! Full View of Enies Lobby!
司法の島! エニエス・ロビーの全貌!
